dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice.operations.handleid
Class AbstractHandleIdPushOperation

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.util.AbstractExecutableExtension
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice.AbstractPushOperation
          dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice.AbstractConfigurablePushOperation
              dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice.operations.handleid.AbstractHandleIdPushOperation
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension
Direct Known Subclasses:
CanTpRxNPduHandleIdPushOperation, SimpleHandleIdPushOperation, ZeroCostHandleIdPushOperation
public abstract class AbstractHandleIdPushOperation
extends AbstractConfigurablePushOperation

This is the base implementation for all Handle-ID Push Operations. Handle-ID Push Operations should implement this class instead of AbstractPushOperation.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.b

getSchemaPathForModuleType

public java.lang.String getSchemaPathForModuleType(ECUConfigContext context,
                                                   java.lang.String moduleType,
                                                   java.lang.String listPath)
Returns the schema path of a concrete module configuration within a given ecu configuration for a given generic schema path

Parameters:
context - The ecu configuration context to search within
moduleType - The type of the module configuration, e.g. "Com", or "PduR"
listPath - The generic schema path from which the concrete path is derived
Returns:
schema path for the first found module of the given type, or null if no module configuration of the given type is present in the given ecu configuration.
Since:
2008.b

doCanHandle

public boolean doCanHandle(AbstractPushEvent event)
Description copied from class: AbstractPushOperation
Checks if the push operation can handle the given event.

This method must be overridden in implementations of a PushOperation.

The default implementation returns true.

Overrides:
doCanHandle in class AbstractConfigurablePushOperation
Parameters:
event - The event
Returns:
true if the push operation can handle the given event, false if not
